name: Monty Norman's James Bond Theme
description:
Goal: Kill Bond before he kills you. (~20 sec.) First to 7 points wins.

Controls: Arrows/WASD = movement, Space = shoot.

Tip: Use headphones. The closer you get to Bond the louder the music becomes.

Tip 2: Hold down the arrows to move, not just tap them.

Credits

Game/Art: Soda51

Music: Monty Norman (GoldenEye 007 version by Grant Kirkhope.)

Bond Creator: Ian Fleming
